revision.text:
[[File:FarmPoint.png|thumb|200px|A Farm Point]] ==Details== ===Description=== Farm Points are gained by harvesting [[berries]] (withering does not grant farm points) on the [[farm]]. Different types of [[berries]] may give more Farm Points. They can be used to buy [[Masterball]] at the Pokemon Leagues or for [[Farm Items]] at the [[Berry Master|Berry Masters]]. They are also used for 1-time purchases and upgrades of the [[Squirtbottle]] and [[Sprinklotad]] ([[Oak Items]]). ===Farm Points Earned=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Berry !! Farm Points
per Second !! Total berries
per harvest !! Total Farm Point
per harvest !! Total time till ripe |- | [[File:Yache.png|25px]] [[Yache]] || style="text-align:right" | 0.034 {{farmpoints}} || style="text-align:right" | 25 berries || style="text-align:right" | 1500 {{farmpoints}} || style="text-align:right" | 12 hours |- | [[File:Babiri.png|25px]] [[Babiri]] || style="text-align:right" | 0.037 {{farmpoints}} || style="text-align:right" | 36 berries || [[File:FarmPoint.png|thumb|200px|A Farm Point]] ==Details== ===Description=== Farm Points are gained by harvesting [[berries]] (withering does not grant farm points) on the [[farm]]. Different types of [[berries]] may give more Farm Points. They can be used to buy [[Masterball]] at the Pokemon Leagues or for [[Farm Items]] at the [[Berry Master|Berry Masters]]. They are also used for 1-time purchases and upgrades of the [[Squirtbottle]] and [[Sprinklotad]] ([[Oak Items]]). ===Farm Points Earned=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Berry !! Farm Points

[[File:FarmPoint.png|thumb|200px|A Farm Point]] ==Details== ===Description=== Farm Points are gained by harvesting [[berries]] (withering does not grant farm points) on the [[farm]]. Different types of [[berries]] may give more Farm Points. They can be used to buy [[Masterball]] at the Pokemon Leagues or for [[Farm Items]] at the [[Berry Master|Berry Masters]]. They are also used for 1-time purchases and upgrades of the [[Squirtbottle]] and [[Sprinklotad]] ([[Oak Items]]). ===Farm Points Earned=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Berry !! Farm Points
per Second !! Total berries
per harvest !! Total Farm Point
per harvest !!
